typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		article as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		UnitID as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code point de vente} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> vfconfortPrepared
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string,
		article as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		month as string,
		year as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		distributeur as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> mabillePrepared
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		marque_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> orcabPrepared
source(output(
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque_file as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		canal as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		marque_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> tereva
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		sous_famille as string,
		reference as string,
		agence_code as string,
		departement_id as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		distributeur as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSC
source(output(
		distributeur as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		marque_id as string,
		marque_file as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> maillard
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		reference as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		marque_id as string,
		year as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Partedis
source(output(
		marque_file as string,
		{Région} as string,
		{Nom Agence} as string,
		agence_code as string,
		{Département} as string,
		{Référence Article} as string,
		{Description Article} as string,
		{Catégorie Achat} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		str_mois as string,
		year as string,
		{Gestion entrepôt} as string,
		{Marques/ Constructeur} as string,
		month as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		{CP Coop.} as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		BrandID as string,
		Dept as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qté vente directe} as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EHS
vfconfortPrepared, mabillePrepared union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1, sOrcab union(byName: true)~> Union2
tereva select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque_file,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		HubSAPid,
		County,
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		marque_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sTereva
distributeurDSC select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		sous_famille,
		reference,
		agence_code,
		departement_id,
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sDSC
maillard select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		reference,
		article,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		{Code postal},
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		marque_id,
		marque_file
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sMaillard
distributeurOrcab select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		reference,
		article,
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		marque_id,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sOrcab
Union2, sTereva union(byName: true)~> Union3
Union3, sDSC union(byName: true)~> Union4
Union4, sMaillard union(byName: true)~> Union5
UnionEHS select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file,
		ca_ecoulement,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur,
		agence_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
orcabPrepared derive(distributeur = "orcab") ~> distributeurOrcab
distributeurPartedis select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		{Code postal},
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id,
		year,
		month,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sPartedis
Partedis derive(distributeur = "partedis") ~> distributeurPartedis
Union5, sPartedis union(byName: true)~> unionPartedis
DSC derive(distributeur = "DSC") ~> distributeurDSC
unionPartedis, sEHS union(byName: true)~> UnionEHS
EHS select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		{Code postal},
		Article,
		reference,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sEHS
dropColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['allDistruUnioned.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> allDistruUnioned
